recipe.title: Rosemary and Lemon Pinto Beans
ingredients: 2 15- to 16-ounce cans pinto beans, rinsed, drained
instructions: Combine first 7 ingredients in medium bowl. Toss to blend. Season to taste with salt and pepper. (Can be made 1 day ahead. Cover and chill. Let stand at room temperature 30 minutes before serving.) Squeeze lemon wedges over. Garnish with rosemary sprigs, if desired.
